title: Nextflow pipeline parameters
description: This pipeline uses Nextflow and processes some kind of data. The JSON Schema was built using the nf-core pipeline schema builder.

input_output_parameters.title: Input/ Output parameters
input_output_parameters.description: Parameters to define the input and output
input_output_parameters.help_text: S3 path to a directory/folder that contains bisulfite treated paired-end reads in FastQ format

indir.description: Path to an input directory from which paired-end FastQ files are read
indir.help_text: Filenames must match the following pattern *_{1,2}.fastq

outdir.description: Path to an output directory where the results are written
outdir.help_text: This should be a path to an S3 bucket/folder where the results of the workflow execution are written

run_name.description: Name of the analysis. Used as directory and file name in the output
run_name.help_text: Used as result directory name and to name global report files. Should not be an empty string

email.description: Set this parameter to your e-mail address to get a summary e-mail with details of the run sent to you when the workflow exits.

bismark_bisulfite_alignment.title: Bismark bisulfite alignment
bismark_bisulfite_alignment.help_text: Parameters relevant for alignment of bisulfite treated reads using Bismark

summary_report_title.description: Title for the Bismark summary report

min_coverage.description: minimal number of mapped reads (coverage) for a CpG motive necessary for methylation value calling
